General.Name: HextraCoin
General.Description: HextraCoin is a Proof of Work/Proof of Stake cryptocurrency based on the Scrypt algorithm.

ICO.Description:
HextraCoin is a Proof of Work/Proof of Stake cryptocurrency based on the Scrypt algorithm.

HextraCoin will be holding its ICO on 1st of October, 2017 which is expected to end on 30th of October. The ICO token supply represents 31% of the total token supply, so there will be a total of 29000000 tokens available, for 0.9 USD each during the offering.

The HextraCoin ICO campaign will feature a bonus program, and the token will be mineable.

Bonus Structure:

  • 0.9 USD 1-5 October or 0-1.5 million tokens;
  • 0.95 USD 6-10 October or 1.5-3 million tokens;
  • 1 USD 11-15 October or 3-4.5 million tokens;
  • 1.05 USD 16-20 October or 4.5-6 million tokens;
  • 1.10 USD 21-25 October or 6-7.5 million tokens;
  • 1.15 USD 26-30 October or 7.5-9 million tokens;
